title: I were a member of The Community Boys Club during the 50`s & 60`s . I was also a member of The Drum & Bugle Corp . How and where can I get photos of that time period ?
text:
I didn't have much finding anything.

If youÍre on Facebook, you might try posting this on the ñHey Wilmington, Do You Rememberî group page and see if you get a response.
